This project Remarkable is awesome.

To enable Disqus comments + badges for this site, add it to your Disqus account.

Also, you can/should create a Lighthouse project for your project and update "TODO" within the _layouts files with the project id (e.g. "12345-remarkable" from the Lighthouse project url).
